name: Opemipo Aikomo
description: Ope started wuruwuru and directs the circus. In his spare time, he also leads design at Paystack.
mobileDescription: Ope started wuruwuru and directs the circus.
In his spare time, he also leads design at Paystack.

name: Williams Ogah
description: Williams is curious about how creative ideas come to life. He previously worked as a project manager, enjoys taking naps, and also runs a consulting business.
mobileDescription: Williams previously worked as a project manager and is curious about how creative ideas come to life.
When he's not taking naps, he also runs a consulting business.

name: Tomiwa Ajiboye
description: Tomiwa is a product designer and music buff. He enjoys taking it slow or going really fast, no in-betweens. He's building Comicrunes - a platform for reading comics.
mobileDescription: Tomiwa is a product designer and music buff.
He's building Comicrunes, a platform for bringing comics to readers.
He enjoys taking it slow at the park or driving really fast. No in-betweens.

name: Eris Ekanem
description: Eris is a writer and storyboard artist. She's learning French and training her cat with sign language.
mobileDescription: Ekanem is a writer and storyboard artist.
She's learning French and training her cat with sign language.
